headline: Sr. Software Engineer | Quantitative Engineer
professionalSummary: Sr. software engineer with 8+ years building distributed systems, real-time data pipelines, and high-throughput APIs. Experienced at Amazon and startups delivering fault-tolerant, low-latency systems handling millions of transactions daily. Skilled in event-driven architectures and large-scale data processing, with a focus on applying systems expertise to quantitative trading and financial engineering.
